translations.chinese: 十 一月，沛公引兵之薜。
translations.english: In the eleventh month, Pei Gong led troops to Xue.

translations.chinese: 秦泗川守壯兵敗於薛，走至戚，沛公左司馬得殺之。
translations.english: The Qin governor of Si River Zhuang was defeated at Xue and fled to Qi, where Pei Gong's left commander Sima De killed him.
Pei Gong returned his army to Kangfu and arrived at Fang Yu.
King Wu of Zhao was killed by his own general.

translations.chinese: 十二月，楚王陳涉為其御莊賈所殺。
translations.english: In the twelfth month, King Chen She of Chu was killed by his charioteer Zhuang Jia.
